name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow me to click Google Maps

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows user to go to maps from search results in google since it is impossible and has to be explicitly done by searching maps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AllowMeToClickGoogleMap is an addon designed to streamline your browsing experience by adding a convenient "Open map" button to search results. With a single click, you can seamlessly redirect to Google Maps to view the location corresponding to the search result.
As Google has removed the functionality to comply with UE regulations.
